name: Monos: The Endless Tower
description:
• The twist? The action takes place on a tower that evolves continuously!
  • Different types of weapons await you, each useful in different situations!
  • Release magical powers on enemies that climb on the tower.
  • Evolve your tower every 10 waves and choose new passives with your upgrade coins!





  • Defeat the enemies trying to reach the crystal at the top of the tower!
  • Each enemy one has its own behavior!
  • Pick the right weapons and powers to defeat them!





  • Challenge yourself after beating the main game!
  • Unlock the hardest difficulty after 100 waves!
  • Enjoy tower defense awesomeness in endless mode!
  • Randomized waves and enemies will keep you on your toes!
